text: 9/11 is a 2002 documentary about the September 11 attacks in New York, where two planes crashed into the buildings of the World Trade Center. The movie was directed by Jules and Gédéon Naudet and James Hanlon. == Other websites == * Category:American documentary movies Category:2002 movies Category:Movies based on the September 11 attacks Category:Movies set in Manhattan
title: 9/11 (2002 movie)
